special_notes: Does NOT use the letter 'O'. Only the number '0' is used. Verify this tag as WY-11TRL11481 (INCLUDE slanted 'TRL'). For apportioned tags, verify as is. INCLUDE the letter 'T' when verifying TRUCK tags. If there is only 1 digit in front of the horse, include the number '0' in front of the single digit (e.g., WY-0139181). If the tag contains a LETTER in front of the horse, the zero is not needed.

stacked_character_rules.notes: Extracted from 0 plate types with character modifications
